<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Urn of Ashes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3420)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Void" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=510" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 307 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This pewter urn contains the ashes of a benevolent ancestor, with a sliver of lingering spirit that strives to protect you.

**Activate—Doom the Urn** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))  **Trigger** You would become [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=67), or your doomed value would increase; **Requirements** The ashes aren't doomed;; **Effect** The ashes in the urn intervene, taking the doomed condition in your place, and you don't gain or increase the value of your doomed condition. Each night when you get a full night's rest, you can reduce your own doomed condition or that of the urn, but not both.

**Activate—Spirit's Wrath** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=540), [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per round;   **Effect** The urn shoots a bolt of void energy at a foe within 30 feet. Attempt a spell attack roll against the target's AC, using a modifier of +15 or your own spell attack modifier, whichever is higher. On a success, the bolt deals 4d4 void damage (doubled on a critical success).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Urn of Ashes
